name: Something (AverageDev)
description:
INSTALLATION!!

  1. Download all the three  files WindowsNoEditor.7z,WindowsNoEditor.7z.002 and WindowsNoEditor.7z.003
  2. Extract WindowsNoEditor.7z using any archive manager.
  3. After extraction start the application by double clicking "something"
  4. ENJOY
